name: Root-1
overview:
Root-One has built a server platform for content used in educational apps. This platform enables content creators to quickly deploy their knowledge in the form of apps that users can access either on the web or on mobile platforms. Usage of their content is then tracked and reported in detailed analytics and can be useful to follow up interventions. Users using the content can also benefit from advanced scheduling strategies that make use of constraints in time, cognitive capabilities and interest profiles.

Root-One or its products have been profiled by PBS/MindShift, featured by Apple and Google, and selected by Fast Company as one of the ten most innovative education companies in 2012.
